scripts.compile: hardhat compile && hardhat typechain && npm run prettier
scripts.deploy: npm run compile && cd ../../typescript/nomad-deploy && npm run deploy-bridge
scripts.verify:mainnet: hardhat clean && hardhat --network mainnet verify-deploy --environment prod
scripts.verify:dev:kovan: hardhat clean && hardhat --network kovan verify-deploy --environment dev
scripts.verify:dev:rinkeby: hardhat clean && hardhat --network rinkeby verify-deploy --environment dev
scripts.verify:staging:kovan: hardhat clean && hardhat --network kovan verify-deploy --environment staging
scripts.verify:staging:rinkeby: hardhat clean && hardhat --network rinkeby verify-deploy --environment staging
scripts.deploy-verify: npm run deploy && npm run verify
